product_name: Gerber Evo Mid Tanto Serrated Knife
long_description: Made of surgical stainless steel with a finger flip for easy opening, the Gerber EVO Mid Tanto Serrated Knife sports a low-rise pocket clip for everyday carrying. Features a tactically styled Tanto blade shape. Titanium nitride-coated blade is treated for strength and corrosion resistance. Liner lock mechanism for 1-handed closing; finger flip for easy opening. Gerber EVO Mid Tanto Serrated Knife has an anodized aluminum handle with cutouts to lighten the weight.
short_description: Made of surgical stainless steel with a finger flip for easy opening, the Gerber EVO Mid Tanto Serrated Knife sports a low-rise pocket clip for everyday carrying.
